original_text:
Pains as of a woman in childbirth come to him,
    but he is a child without wisdom;
when the time arrives,
    he doesn’t have the sense to come out of the womb.
korean_text: 해산하는 여인의 어려움이 그에게 임하리라 그는 지혜 없는 자식이로다 해산할 때가 되어도 그가 나오지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: Pains as of a woman in childbirth come to him
but he is a child without wisdom
he doesn't have the sense to come out of the womb
